short_summary: Front End Loader for Jasper National Park, Alberta

full_summary:
# Government of Canada Tender Notice
## Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0055/A
### Tender Description

Parks Canada Agency is seeking a Front End Loader, to be delivered to Jasper National Park in Alberta. The delivery date is expected to be on or before October 31, 2023.

This tender is open to suppliers that hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18LOAD/A. 

To be considered for a Pre-Qualification, refer to: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-644-75242](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-644-75242).

### Tender Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to provide one (1) Front End Loader that meets the requirements specified in the solicitation document.

### Bidder Information

For questions or concerns, please contact:

* Terry Imm, Contracting Authority
* Phone: (250) 837-1659
* Email: [terry.imm@pc.gc.ca](mailto:terry.imm@pc.gc.ca)

### Notice of Intent

By submitting a bid, bidders acknowledge that they have read and understood the solicitation document and the terms and conditions of the contract.

### Debriefing Requests

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests must be made in writing within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

### Contact Information

Terry Imm
Contracting Authority
(Parks Canada Agency)
[220 - 4 Avenue S.E., suite 720 Calgary, Alberta T2G 4X3](mailto:220 - 4 Avenue S.E., suite 720 Calgary, Alberta T2G 4X3)

Phone: (250) 837-1659
Email: [terry.imm@pc.gc.ca](mailto:terry.imm@pc.gc.ca)
Fax: (866) 246-6893

This is the end of the tender notice. Remember to submit your bid on or before the closing date of July 19, 2023, at 4:00 pm MDT.
